title: Intermittent control switch characteristics of triboelectric electric hybrid energy harvesting devices and power management circuits
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00754A, Paper
Xin Yu, Mingxing Cui, Wendong Qi, Xinrui Li, Yuhang Xing, Xiaolei Lu, Shitong Yang, Jing Zhao, Changhong Jiang
A triboelectric electric hybrid energy harvesting device (HEH-TENG) and its power management circuit (HEH-PMC) with intermittent control switches were designed to harvest mechanical energy from rotation and vibration.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
